    • elementAt

      public GUIElement elementAt​(int x, int y)
      Returns the GUIElement at position (x,y). If such element does not exist, return null.
      Parameters:

      y - - y coordinate
      Returns:
      GUIElement at coordinate (x,y) | otherwise null
